                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> payload,
                           boolean sentByUser)
                    throws ModuleException
        Executes a specific module command.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to execute.
        payload - The payload passed to the command.
        sentByUser - True if the command was sent by a user, false otherwise.
